kpi.name: M1001C101

kpi_info.title: RAB SETUP FAILURES DUE TO BTS FOR PS DATA STREAM
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB setup failures caused by BTS for PS data streaming. UPDATED:When the RAB assignment fails due to radio link setup or reconfiguration failure. The failure can happen either in the Iub or in the Iur interface.

kpi.kpi_alias: RAB SETUP FAILURES DUE TO BTS FOR PS DATA STREAM
